artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape view with five figures on road, LLC; ducks swimming on water surrounding wall at right; buildings in middle ground; mountain peaks in background, from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: Censor seals: 米良 {Mera}, 渡辺 {Watanabe}; Publisher seal: 佐野喜 {Sanoki}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Beach by Yamashita cho_ in Edo, from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
